DOC.criteria: Older 18 year age Diagnosed OSA ( obstructive sleep apnea ) eligible CPAP treatment local requirement ( NICE guideline : AHI ( apnea hypopnea index ) ≥ 15 , AHI > 5 significant daytime sleepiness ) Naïve CPAP therapy , i.e . prescribe , use CPAP last 5 year .
